Package jam.util

A few useful classes for performing some common tasks, such as opening file dialogs, formatting numbers and String manipulation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AwtUtilities Contains useful methods for manipulating AWT classes.
FileUtilities AWT utility class for easy creation of file dialogs.
NumberUtilities Contains utilities for manipulating Numbers Converts native types to array of bytes and array of bytes to native types.
StringUtilities Contains utilities for manipulating String objects.
 

Exception Summary
UtilException Exceptions thrown in the jam.util package are converted to this.
 

Package jam.util Description

A few useful classes for performing some common tasks, such as opening file dialogs, formatting numbers and String manipulation.
